channel.title: !i need help to make my server good!
channel.description: :)[glow=blue,2,300]HELLO EVERYBODY [/glow] :) [glow=teal,2,300]I need help with:[/glow] [glow=red,2,300]1.How to make myself and other peoples admins[/glow] [glow=yellow,2,300]2.How to make myself and other peoples mods[/glow] [glow=green,2,300]3.How to make shops with items[/glow] [glow=orange,2,300]4.How to change the ::help etc.[/glow]

item.title: !i need help to make my server good!
item.dc:creator: @Mrquarter Mrquarter
item.description:
@Mrquarter wrote:

  1. Go into client.java and search for //Start of mod list

Then you should see like playerName.equals(“NAMEHERE”) put your name in the name here.

  1. Same as one but their name
  2. Go into shops.cfg and change the id’s of the items in the shops.
  3. Search help in client.java and there should be a help menu. Change the text

YOU MUST COMPILE AFTER ALL OF THESE TO MAKE THEM GO INTO EFFECT!

Read full topic
item.source: !i need help to make my server good!
